quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Character and Jedi
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, squadron, padme. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Whose body was replaced in the 2004 Remastered DVD at the very end of The Return of the Jedi?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Anakin Skywalkers

questions.question: Which of these lines was spoken by Darth Maul, a fictional character in the Star Wars universe?

options.text: Brave, but, foolish, my old Jedi friend.
It is obvious that this contest cannot be decided by our knowledge of the Force... but by our skills with a lightsaber.
Wipe them out, all of them.
At last we will reveal ourselves to the Jedi. At last we will have revenge.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: At last we will reveal ourselves to the Jedi. At last we will have revenge.

questions.question: What is the price that Jabba settles on with the Bounty Hunter for Chewbacca?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 35,000 credits

questions.question: What is the name of the squadron of blue-striped clone troopers that Darth Vader leads into the Jedi Temple?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 501st Legion

questions.question: Padme Amidala is the queen of which planet in the Star Wars universe?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Naboo

questions.question: Who played the twin look-a-like of Queen Amidala in The Phantom Menace?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Keira Knightley

questions.question: The following words belong to which Star Wars character: Then our worst fears have been realized. We must move quickly if the Jedi Order is to survive.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mace Windu

questions.question: Where does Star Wars character Obi-Wan kill General Grievous?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Utapau

questions.question: On the fictional Star Wars planet Geonosis, Obi-Wan learns that Count Dooku and Nute Gunray have built a new droid army, and that Gunray has ordered the assassination of which one of these?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Padmé

questions.question: Which Star wars character said, I killed them. I killed them all. Theyre dead, every single one of them.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Anakin Skywalker

questions.question: What were C-3POs last words in Revenge of the Sith?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Oh no!

questions.question: Which Star Wars character asked the question, Are you an angel??
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Anakin Skywalker

questions.question: Which fictional character stated, I dont mind flying, but what youre doing is suicide.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Obi Wan Kenobi

questions.question: Which of these characters was Obi-Wan Kenobis mentor?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Qui Gon Jin

questions.question: What directive ordered the Clone Troopers to destroy all of the Jedi in Star Wars?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Order 66

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Fast Times and Ridgemont High
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, high. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Who played Alfred in the 2005 movie Batman Begins?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Michael Caine

questions.question: What song is playing during the infamous pool scene with actress Phoebe Cates, in the movie Fast Times at Ridgemont High?

options.text: The Look in Your Eyes by Gerald McMahon  Kid Lightning
Moving In Stereo by The Cars

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Moving In Stereo by The Cars

questions.question: The movie Fast Times at Ridgemont High is based on a book with the same title, written by which author?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cameron Crowe

questions.question: In Fast Times at Ridgemont High, this actor played Brads friend, who was behind the counter at All American Burger, when Brad was fired.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nicolas Cage

questions.question: Fast Times at Ridgemont High was added to the list of films preserved by the U. S. National Film Registry in 2005.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In Fast Times at Ridgemont High, character Jeff Spicoli rescues Brooke Shields from drowning and blows the reward money, hiring which band to play at his birthday party?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Van Halen

questions.question: Jeff Spicoli, a character from Fast Times at Ridgemont High, portrayed by Sean Penn, wears what brand of sneakers?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Vans

questions.question: What role did Jack Black play in the comedy film Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Motorcyclist

questions.question: In Fast Times at Ridgemont High, Ridgemont played against which rival football team?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lincoln High

questions.question: Fast Times at Ridgemont High, directed by Amy Heckerling, was released to theaters in what year?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1982

questions.question: Brad, a character from Fast Times at Ridgemont High, portrayed by Judge Reinhold, was fired from All American Burger, and got a job where?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Captain Hooks

questions.question: Which famous comedian played the role of Miracle Max in the movie The Princess Bride??
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Billy Crystal

questions.question: Who directed The Princess Bride?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rob Reiner

questions.question: Ray Walston, who plays Mr. Hand in Fast Times at Ridgemont High, was a regular cast member on which TV show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: My Favorite Martian

questions.question: In The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe the four main characters are Peter, Edmund, Lucy and who else?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Susan

quizzes.title: Science Quiz: Movie and Character
quizzes.description: Test your science knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Science, fiction, wilsons. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In Wedding Crashers, Owen Wilsons character falls in love with Claire Cleary. He later gets introduced to William Cleary, played by Christopher Walken. What is William Clearys profession?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: U.S. Treasury Secretary

questions.question: In which Lord of the Rings movie does Boromir die?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Fellowship of the Ring

questions.question: Who directed the 2002 science fiction film Signs?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: M. Night Shyamalan

questions.question: What does Andy collect in the comedy The 40-Year-Old Virgin?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: action figures

questions.question: What character did Orlando Bloom play in the 2004 movie Troy?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Paris

questions.question: The quote, I wont kill you, but I dont have to save you is from what movie?

options.text: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
Lord of the Rings, Two Towers

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Batman Begins

questions.question: In the movie The Incredibles, where does the story take place?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Metroville

questions.question: Which movie, released in 2000, won 5 Academy Awards?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gladiator

questions.question: In the 2003 movie Underworld, there were 3 main species - humans, vampires, and what other species?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lycans

questions.question: This answering machine message is from what movie: If you utter so much as one syllable, Ill hunt you down and gut you like a fish. If youd like to fax me, press the star key.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: How the Grinch Stole Christmas

questions.question: In the movie Constantine, while transporting himself to Hell, Constantine chooses using a cat for what what reason?

options.text: Cats are Gods sacred animal and help protect him while in Hell.
Cats are the direct route to hell, created originally for this purpose.
Cats are already half in and half out.
Cats independent personalities are useful in Hell.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cats are already half in and half out.

questions.question: In the 2003 movie Elf, Will Ferrell plays an oversized Elf whose name is what?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Buddy

questions.question: Who plays the character of V behind the mask in the movie V for Vendetta?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hugo Weaving

questions.question: Who voices Princess Fiona in Shrek 2?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cameron Diaz

questions.question: In the movie Charlie and the Chocolate Factory, every Oompa-Loompa is played by the same person.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Peter and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, steve, magazine. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which employee from the movie Office Space was not fired or laid off?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Peter

questions.question: What year was the movie Dirty Dancing first released?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1987

questions.question: Brian, the hyperactive and irritating waiter in the movie Office Space, worked at which restaurant?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chotchkies

questions.question: What was the name of the computer software company for which Peter, Michael and Samir worked in the movie Office Space?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Initech

questions.question: Steve, who one evening tried to sell magazine subscriptions to Peter and his friends in the film Office Space, portrayed himself as a former crack cocaine addict who was already clean and sober. Steve, in fact, later admitted that he was not really a former crack addict, he just faked it to gain sympathy and increase his magazine sales. What was Steves former job?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: computer software engineer

questions.question: In the comedy film Office Space, what was the name of the favorite show that Peter and Joanna enjoyed watching together while they were dating?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kung Fu

questions.question: The writer and director of Office Space, Mike Judge, made a cameo appearance in the film.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Joannas boss in the movie Office Space, Stan, the restaurant manager, counseled her on her work performance on two occasions. What was the reason for the counseling sessions?

options.text: Joanna was not claiming her tip money.
Joanna was constantly tardy to work.
Joanna had complaints from the customers due to her rude behavior.
Joanna was not wearing enough pieces of flair on her uniform.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Joanna was not wearing enough pieces of flair on her uniform.

questions.question: In the film Office Space the two Bobs asked Peter to walk through a typical day at work. Peter admitted he generally came in 15 minutes late and spaced out for about an hour before and after lunch each work day. He then told the two Bobs that in a given week, he only did about how many minutes/hours of real work?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 15 minutes

questions.question: In the film Office Space, after being told he was getting fired, Michael Bolton, along with his friends Peter and Samir, decided to rip off the company they worked for. The plan involved embezzling a tiny amount of money from each financial transaction the company made. From what movie did Michael borrow this plan?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Superman III

questions.question: What was the first name of Napoleons Hispanic friend in the movie Napoleon Dynamite?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pedro

questions.question: Peters next-door neighbor Lawrence, played by Deitrich Bader in the movie Office Space, always seemed to know when Peter was at home. How did Lawrence know this?

options.text: Lawrence had a sixth sense about Peters whereabouts.
Lawrence had an electronic signal that alerted him when Peter arrived home.
Lawrence planted a bug listening device in Peters apartment without Peter knowing about it.
The paper-thin walls of the apartment complex allowed Lawrence to hear everything going on in Peters apartment.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The paper-thin walls of the apartment complex allowed Lawrence to hear everything going on in Peters apartment.

questions.question: In the movie Office Space, Peter, Michael and Samir harbored years of frustration and resentment due to a certain piece of office equipment. They finally had their revenge when they destroyed this object with a baseball bat. What type of equipment did they destroy?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a fax machine

questions.question: Why was Peter always reluctant to open the front door every morning when he went to work in the movie Office Space?

options.text: because Peter dreaded seeing Nina, the corporate accounts payable girl, on the other side of the door
because Peter would immediately see his cubicle and it reminded him how much he hated his job
because Lumbergh was always waiting for him on the other side of the door to greet him with an irritating yeah, um
because Peter was always shocked by static electricity when he touched the doorknob

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: because Peter was always shocked by static electricity when he touched the doorknob

questions.question: Inspired by a near death experience, Tom Smykowski, one of Peters co-workers in the movie Office Space, invented a game called Pay It Forward.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

quizzes.title: Sports Quiz: Movie and Dodgeball
quizzes.description: Test your sports knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Sports, average, cyclist. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What role in the movie Dirty Dancing was the first to be cast?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Penny

questions.question: Kelly Bishop, who plays Marjorie Houseman (Babys mom) in the movie Dirty Dancing, also played the mother on this TV show.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gilmore Girls

questions.question: In the movie Dodgeball, White Goodman put on his shiny shoes and tried to court the beautiful attorney, Kate Veatch. What song was playing in the background when White approached Kates apartment to make his move?

options.text: Stayin Alive by The Bee Gees
The Freaks Come Out At Night by Whodini
Apache by The Sugar Hill Gang

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Apache by The Sugar Hill Gang

questions.question: In the movie Dodgeball, American cyclist Lance Armstrong made a cameo appearance giving Peter La Fleur a pep talk.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: The scene from Dirty Dancing where Johnny is running his hand down Babys arm and side had to be re-shot many times because the director did not like the way Jennifer was laughing.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In the 2004 movie Dodgeball, the two sportscasters for ESPN 8 The Ocho covering the dodgeball championship were Pepper Brooks and who else?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cotton McKnight

questions.question: Peter La Fleurs dodgeball team in the movie Dodgeball celebrated their regional qualifier victory at this restaurant/bar.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Dirty Sanchez

questions.question: In the movie Dodgeball, Peter Le Fleur visited Kate Veatchs apartment and discovered that she had a fascination with these creatures.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: unicorns

questions.question: White Goodman from the movie Dodgeball first met Kate Veatch in his office at Globo Gym. White tried to impress Kate by pretending to read this book when she walked in to meet him.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Websters dictionary

questions.question: What is the name of the hotel where Johnny and Penny do a performance each year in the movie Dirty Dancing?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Shelldrake

questions.question: In the movie Dirty Dancing, Lonny Price played the role of Robbie Gould, the waiter who gets Penny pregnant and dates Babys sister Lisa.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Both Patrick Swayze and Jennifer Grey were how many years older in real life than their characters in the movie Dirty Dancing?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 10

questions.question: In the movie Dodgeball, Coach Patches OHoulihan was a big believer in the five Ds of dodgeball which were dodge, duck, dip, dive and _____________.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: dodge

questions.question: In the comedy movie Dodgeball, Peter La Fleurs Average Joes Gymnasium dodgeball team won their regional qualifier by default because their opponent was disqualified. This default win allowed them to play in the dodgeball championship in Las Vegas. Why was Average Joes opponent disqualified?

options.text: the opposing team did not wear the required matching uniforms
the opposing team failed to register for the regional qualifier
one of the opposing team members used profanity
one of the opposing team members tested positive for steroids

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: one of the opposing team members tested positive for steroids

questions.question: Fictional Average Joes team was disqualified from the championship game with Globo Gym because they originally didnt have enough players.  However, the ADAA by-laws allow a disqualified team to play if it had a favorable two-thirds majority vote from the judges.  Which judge cast the deciding vote to allow the Average Joes team to be reinstated.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chuck Norris

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Dodgeball
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, oz, average. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Who was not a member of the Average Joes Gymnasium dodgeball team featured in the movie Dodgeball?

options.text: Gordon, a subscriber to Obscure Sports Quarterly magazine
Fran, the female Romanovian dodgeball champion
Justin, a high school male cheerleader

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fran, the female Romanovian dodgeball champion

questions.question: What was the last name of Benjamin and his family in the 1967 movie The Graduate?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Braddock

questions.question: What was Navins last name in the 1979 comedy The Jerk?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Johnson

questions.question: In the movie Dodgeball, Peter learned from Kate that Average Joes Gym was $50,000 in debt.  How do Peter and his friends first try to raise money to get out of this debt?

options.text: by having an all male car wash
by having Steve the Pirate rob a bank

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: by having an all male car wash

questions.question: In the 1989 comedy Bill and Teds Excellent Adventure, what was Bills last name and title?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Preston, Esq.

questions.question: What was Dorothys surname in the 1939 classic The Wizard of Oz?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gale

questions.question: Several westerns have been made about this famous family of brothers that rode into history on both sides of the law.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Earp

questions.question: What was the name of the water-fearing sheriff and his family in the 1975 thriller Jaws?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Brody

questions.question: In the classic movie High Society, what was the distinguished last name of the brides family?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lord

questions.question: How is Coach Patches OHoulihan killed in the movie Dodgeball?

options.text: His wheelchair battery shorts out and electrocutes him.
He is run over by a car trying to dodge traffic.
A large sign from inside the casino falls on him.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A large sign from inside the casino falls on him.

questions.question: In the movie Dodgeball, which team did not play in the dodgeball tournament in Las Vegas?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Go Balls Deep

questions.question: What were the first names of the Blues Brothers in the 1980 movie by the same name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Elwood and Jake

questions.question: What is the family name of the heroine in the 1979 thriller Alien?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ripley

questions.question: What is the name of the family that gets Lost in Space in this 1998 sci-fi movie by the same name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Robinson

questions.question: In the movie Dodgeball, Justins high school cheerleading squad was also in Las Vegas competing in the same hotel that the dodgeball championship was being held. Justin helps Amber and the cheerleading squad win by filling in for an injured cheerleader. What was the nickname of Justin and Ambers high school cheerleading squad?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Donkeys
